description: Application for extension to extant planning permission ref: P072654 dated 28.01.08.  " Development of 22-24 Highbury Grove involving the demolition of existing buildings (except 24 Highbury Grove) and construction of new buildings for commercial use (Use Class B1) and 72 residential units of flats and townhouses. The buildings range from three to five storeys. This is a minor amendment to planning permission P061268 granted on appeal 11th May 2007 and involves a reduction in unit numbers from 74 to 72, elevational changes to Aberdeen house and internal changes to layout."
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun no later than the 31st May 2011.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5) and and in line with Town and Country Planning (General Development Procedure ) (Amendment No.3) (England) Order 2009.
